name: The Last Dragon
description:
My entry for WGJ 89.

Take revenge for your fallen dragon kin by burning down human buildings.

Controls:

WASD - move

LMB - fire breath

A/D + SPACE - dash

Most sounds were downloaded from opengameart.org

Music was obtained via the YouTube Studio audio library.

All This - Scoring Action by Kevin MacLeod is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution license (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)
